participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, often immersed in fantasy worlds.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music, always looking for new adventures.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers camping at national parks.
